Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 264.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A prayer to his Heavenly Mistress — three stanzas rhyme royal

Bod120.First Lines:
Besechyth you of moderly peteUpon your son to hawe
                    remembraunce…
Bod120.Last Lines:
…your fayre ueuer forsakeffor Ioy sorow where þat I slepe
                    or wake
Bod120.Attributed Title:
Aue maria (at beginning, f. 95); of hooly chirche fayrest & the
                    best (top right corner, f. 95)
